graph.original_query: ### Generate a Beautiful Multi-Page Landing Website using Flowbite (Dark Mode)Create a **dark-themed, modern landing website** using **Flowbite + Tailwind CSS**.The site should have 4 pages:* `index.html` (Home)* `about.html`* `products.html`* `contact.html`‚úÖ **Site Requirements**#### üåå Theme* Use **Flowbite** with **Tailwind CSS** in **dark mode*** Ensure consistency in fonts, spacing, and responsiveness* Include dark background and high-contrast elements#### üìÑ Pages and Structure1. **index.html (Home)** * Full-screen hero section with background image (from Unsplash or other safe public image sources) * Features section (3‚Äì4 highlights) * Testimonials section (dark cards) * CTA section (‚ÄúStart Free Trial‚Äù or similar) * Footer with social icons + links2. **about.html** * Mission statement * Timeline or values section * Team member cards3. **products.html** * Grid layout with 6‚Äì8 product/service cards * Each card has title, short description, image, price (if relevant) * Filter or category tags optional4. **contact.html** * Contact form with name/email/message * Map placeholder or location card * Email and support links#### üñºÔ∏è Image Guidance* Use image URLs from: * [Unsplash](https://source.unsplash.com) * [Pexels](https://www.pexels.com/) * [Picsum](https://picsum.photos)Example:```html```#### üß© Tech Notes* Use Tailwind + Flowbite CDN setup (no build tools required)* Keep layout modular: shared header/footer across pages* Add `` tags and page titles properly* Ensure mobile responsiveness---### üì¶ Output FormatPlease generate 4 code blocks, one per file:```html...``````html...```...Use real, readable English content ‚Äì not placeholders.The goal is to make the site **look and feel like a real premium product launch site**. Call CoderAgent atleast 66-7 times for different exhaustive but specific tasks as this is a detailed project. Remember CoderAgent is stateless and can't see other outputs. So you will have to be very specific in creating only parts else it will create full htmls---

nodes.description: Initial Query
Generate the basic HTML structure for index.html with Tailwind CSS and Flowbite CDN.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a basic HTML structure for index.html. Include the necessary Tailwind CSS and Flowbite CDN links in the <head> section. Set up a dark theme using Tailwind CSS classes. Ensure basic meta tags and title are included.

nodes.description: Add a full-screen hero section to index.html with a dark-themed background image.
nodes.agent_prompt: Add a full-screen hero section to the `index_html_basic_structure_T001`. Use a dark-themed background image from Unsplash (https://source.unsplash.com/1600x900/?technology,dark). Include a heading, subheading, and a call-to-action button with appropriate dark-themed styling using Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Implement a features section with 3 highlights in index.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Implement a features section in `index_html_hero_section_T002` with 3 highlights. Each highlight should have an icon, title, and a short description. Use dark-themed card styling using Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Design a testimonials section with dark cards for index.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Design a testimonials section in `index_html_features_section_T003` with dark cards. Each card should include a quote, author name, and author title. Use dark-themed card styling with Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Create a call-to-action section for index.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a call-to-action section in `index_html_testimonials_section_T004` with a prominent button (e.g., Start Free Trial). Use dark-themed styling with Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Add a footer with social icons and links to index.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Add a footer to `index_html_cta_section_T005` with social icons (e.g., Font Awesome, inline SVG) and links. Ensure proper dark-themed styling using Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Generate the basic HTML structure for about.html with Tailwind CSS and Flowbite CDN.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a basic HTML structure for about.html. Include the necessary Tailwind CSS and Flowbite CDN links in the <head> section. Set up a dark theme using Tailwind CSS classes. Ensure basic meta tags and title are included.

nodes.description: Add a mission statement section to about.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Add a mission statement section to `about_html_basic_structure_T007`. Include a heading and a paragraph describing the company's mission. Use dark-themed styling with Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Implement a timeline or values section for about.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Implement a timeline or values section in `about_html_mission_statement_T008`. Use a visually appealing timeline or a list of core values with brief descriptions. Use dark-themed styling with Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Design team member cards for about.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Design team member cards in `about_html_timeline_values_T009`. Each card should include a team member's photo, name, title, and a short bio. Use dark-themed card styling using Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Generate the basic HTML structure for products.html with Tailwind CSS and Flowbite CDN.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a basic HTML structure for products.html. Include the necessary Tailwind CSS and Flowbite CDN links in the <head> section. Set up a dark theme using Tailwind CSS classes. Ensure basic meta tags and title are included.

nodes.description: Implement a grid layout for product/service cards in products.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Implement a grid layout in `products_html_basic_structure_T011` with 6 product/service cards. Each card should have a title, short description, image (from Pexels), and price (if relevant). Use dark-themed card styling using Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Add filter or category tags (optional) to products.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Add filter or category tags (optional) to `products_html_grid_layout_T012` using Tailwind CSS. These tags should allow users to filter the products displayed.

nodes.description: Generate the basic HTML structure for contact.html with Tailwind CSS and Flowbite CDN.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a basic HTML structure for contact.html. Include the necessary Tailwind CSS and Flowbite CDN links in the <head> section. Set up a dark theme using Tailwind CSS classes. Ensure basic meta tags and title are included.

nodes.description: Create a contact form with name, email, and message fields for contact.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a contact form in `contact_html_basic_structure_T014` with name, email, and message fields. Use Tailwind CSS for styling and ensure proper validation.

nodes.description: Add a map placeholder or location card to contact.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Add a map placeholder (e.g., using an iframe from Google Maps) or a location card to `contact_html_contact_form_T015`. Include the company's address. Use dark-themed styling with Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Include email and support links in contact.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Include email and support links in `contact_html_map_location_T016`. Ensure proper styling and link functionality. Use dark-themed styling with Tailwind CSS.

nodes.description: Integrate shared header in `index.html` by referring to other files.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using Tailwind CSS and Flowbite, integrate a common header in `index_html_footer_T006`. Create header with dark theme using links for Home, About, Products and Contact

nodes.description: Integrate shared header in `about.html` by referring to other files.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using Tailwind CSS and Flowbite, integrate a common header in `about_html_team_members_T010`. Create header with dark theme using links for Home, About, Products and Contact

nodes.description: Integrate shared header in `products.html` by referring to other files.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using Tailwind CSS and Flowbite, integrate a common header in `products_html_filters_T013`. Create header with dark theme using links for Home, About, Products and Contact

nodes.description: Integrate shared header in `contact.html` by referring to other files.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using Tailwind CSS and Flowbite, integrate a common header in `contact_html_support_links_T017`. Create header with dark theme using links for Home, About, Products and Contact

nodes.description: Create a shared footer for all the pages.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using Tailwind CSS and Flowbite, create a shared footer with social icons and links to be used across all pages (index.html, about.html, products.html, contact.html) in a dark theme.

nodes.description: Add shared footer to index.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using Tailwind CSS and Flowbite, integrate shared footer `shared_footer_T022` in `index_html_complete_T018`.

nodes.description: Add shared footer to about.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using Tailwind CSS and Flowbite, integrate shared footer `shared_footer_T022` in `about_html_complete_T019`.

nodes.description: Add shared footer to products.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using Tailwind CSS and Flowbite, integrate shared footer `shared_footer_T022` in `products_html_complete_T020`.

nodes.description: Add shared footer to contact.html.
nodes.agent_prompt: Using Tailwind CSS and Flowbite, integrate shared footer `shared_footer_T022` in `contact_html_complete_T021`.

nodes.description: Summarize index.html file.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a summary of `index_html_complete_with_footer_T023` file.

nodes.description: Summarize about.html file.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a summary of `about_html_complete_with_footer_T024` file.

nodes.description: Summarize products.html file.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a summary of `products_html_complete_with_footer_T025` file.

nodes.description: Summarize contact.html file.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a summary of `contact_html_complete_with_footer_T026` file.
